revised_title: Energy Metabolism and Gene Expression in Drosophila Melanogaster
tldr: The study investigates the effect of supplemental NAD on the development and fitness of Drosophila melanogaster. It shows that NAD significantly decreases larval development time by modifying the NAD pool, altering electron transport chain activity, and ATP, ADP, and AMP levels. This suggests a link between energy metabolism and gene expression.
scientific_discipline: Biology and Life Sciences > Developmental Biology
